Let your dreams take flight

You're Almost There

How?

How does it work?

Almost There makes createing a fundsraising campaign as easy as it gets. You need a good idea: We will take care of the rest!

With Almost There there are no intermediaries, the donations go straight from the donors to the campaign owner. When the campaign is over, if the goal was not reached, though, the donations will be returned.

Make your own campaign

You're Almost There!

To create your own campaign, you first need to login.

Login

Hello , you're ready to start a campaign
But first, we need some information


What will this campaign be about?


Help

E.g. Help me publish my new videogame. Help us open the new kitten shelter.

Now, let's elaborate a bit more.

Tell your potential donors why you need their help.

Next, some big numbers


Your campaign goal

Remember this goal and the donations you will receive, are in theNear cryptocurrency.


The closing date

This date marks the limit to achieve your donations goal. If the campaign is successfull, you'll keep it all. If not, the donations will be returned.

And for the cherry on top, add some resources.


A splash image to pair with your description.

A video explaining the whole idea.

All ready!

Check the preview Publish! Check it out!
